飄.definition: to float (in the air); to flutter; to waft; complacent; frivolous; weak; shaky; wobbly

飄忽不定.definition: to drift without a resting place (idiom); roving; errant; vagrant; erratic

飄揚.definition: to wave; to flutter; to fly

飄搖.definition: floating in the wind; swaying; tottering; unstable

飄散.definition: to waft (through the air); to drift

飄浮.definition: to float; to hover; also written 漂浮

飄然.definition: to float in the air; swiftly; nimbly; easy and relaxed

飄盪.definition: to drift; to wave; to float on the waves; to flutter in the wind

飄緲.definition: variant of 飄渺|飘渺[piao1 miao3]

飄舉.definition: to dance; to float in the wind

飄舞.definition: to fly up; to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)

飄落.definition: to float down; to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)

飄蓬.definition: to float in the wind; by ext., to lead a wandering life

飄逸.definition: graceful; elegant; to drift; to float

飄零.definition: to fall and wither (like autumn leaves); (fig.) drifting and homeless

飄颻.definition: variant of 飄搖|飘摇[piao1 yao2]

飄飄.definition: to float about; to flutter (in the breeze); (dialect) gay guy; (Tw) ghost

飄飄然.definition: elated; light and airy feeling (after a few drinks); smug and conceited; complacent

飄香.definition: (of a fragrance) to waft about; (fig.) (of foods) to become popular in other places as well
